title: City Escape in Heart of Helsinki Overlooking Hesperia Park
description: Mirroring the style and functionality of the city in which it resides, enjoy a peaceful city escape to Crowne Plaza Helsinki - Hesperia, an IHG Hotel. With the city's electrifying sights only a short stroll away, neoclassical history, intriguing culture and creative designs are at your fingertips. Feast on a bevy of Finnish flavours, sustainably foraged and farmed dishes, at the cosy Hesperia Restaurant And Bar, or enjoy a drink at the lobby bar and watch the world go by.
location_description: Crowne Plaza Helsinki - Hesperia, an IHG Hotel

title: Hedonistic Helsinki Haven with Scandinavian-Style Bistro
description: Helsinki is synonymous with cool, style and design, and Hotel Indigo Helsinki is no exception. Among the unique murals designed by local artists find a treasure trove of bespoke, modern facilities including Restaurant Br√∂d ('bread') an urban bistro serving Finnish delicacies, locally baked bread and mouthwatering seafood. After days spent exploring, step into the Finnish sauna at the Body, Mind & Soul Studio to relax and steam the day away, Fin-style.
location_description: Hotel Indigo Helsinki - Boulevard, an IHG Hotel
